title: Credit点券问题
author: XL铭梦、
txt_content: 想问一下用Credit点券插件怎么配合cc钟表菜单一起使用，比如给一点点券执行指令

replies.author: 酥宁最酥啦
replies.txt_content:
苏宁y 发表于 2020-7-20 21:31
COMMAND: "op:ca add  "
TreeDiagramC1:
  NAME: '&4获取点券'
  LORE:
    - '&7点击获取100点券'
  ID: 366
  COMMAND: 'op:ca add {player} 100'
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 3

replies.author: TCmc
replies.txt_content:
建议用树状图第三方软件编辑
建议好用
